title: Dark Candy Fiddlesticks Ultimate
body:
I was playing a match with Risen Fiddlesticks on Top lane. The enemy team had a DarkCandy Fiddlesticks. He tried to gank me with his ult. As a Fiddle main i never saw the DC Fiddlesticks ult in game. (Only in SkinSpotlight) But when he ulted me the ult displayed was Surprise Party's? I thought it was a one time bug but it happend the entire game. His model didn't change the special running animation didn't change just the particles and sounds.

{{champion:9}} : Fix this please :0

EDIT 1: Im a dumb potatoe. Rito changed the old DC Fiddle ult into SP Fiddle ult      -Facepalm-{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

EDIT 2: Wait. Im confused. I need some solid proof because some people say that he still has the normal blizzard ult... Someone help?

replies.body:
Hey FoxSpirituality - 

Thanks for the report! We have seen issues of this occurring. Let me see what's going on here - seems like it may be a case of particle theft. You're correct in that Dark Candy Fiddlesticks should be using his own ult, not that of Surprise Party Fiddlesticks.

Ok Thank you for reading this :) .
I hope this gets solved ^^
